description: This file implements a React component for a detailed connection view page in a web application, including multiple subcomponents for displaying containers, items, item details, comments, raw JSON, and managing navigation via tabs. It interacts with backend APIs using fetch and SWR for data fetching and cache management, employing various utility functions and UI components built with Tailwind CSS.

methods.name: envelopeFetcher
methods.description: A generic asynchronous fetch function that retrieves JSON data from a given URL, normalizes error handling, and processes envelope pattern responses.

methods.name: ContainersList
methods.description: Component that fetches and displays a list of containers associated with a connection.

methods.name: ItemsPanel
methods.description: Component that manages listing, searching, creating, and revalidating items within a container.

methods.name: ItemOpenButton
methods.description: Button component to open and display details of a specific item.

methods.name: ItemDetail
methods.description: Component that displays detailed information for a selected item, including comments and ability to add new comments.

methods.name: RawJson
methods.description: Component to display raw JSON of connection details for debugging.

methods.name: ConnectionDetailPage
methods.description: Main React component that orchestrates everything, including fetching the connection, managing tab navigation, and rendering subcomponents based on active tab.
